chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Jori Congar, p. 650—Man from the Two Rivers. He is very skinny, but still eats twice what anyone else does. He will also drink so he cannot stand if given the chance. He is a good shot with a bow and arrows, close behind Jondyn. He is also a skilled pickpocket. Jori appeared in the false reality created by the Dark One for Rand, the reality that would exist if the Dark One prevailed. The real Jori Congar died during the Last Battle. Editor's note: Jori Congar is not to be confused with Jori, Morvrin's Warder.
